courseDescription: A comprehensive course on essential life skills.

modules.title: Course Introduction
modules.description: Overview of the Life Skills Course.

modules.title: Introduction to Life Skills
modules.description: Definition and benefits of life skills education.

modules.title: Self Awareness
modules.description: Understanding oneself, identifying strengths and weaknesses.

modules.title: Self Esteem
modules.description: Building self-confidence and self-worth.

modules.title: Stress Management
modules.description: Identifying stressors and coping with stress.

modules.title: Emotions
modules.description: Understanding and managing emotions.

modules.title: Empathy
modules.description: Understanding and sharing the feelings of others.

modules.title: Communication
modules.description: Effective communication skills and overcoming barriers.

modules.title: Conflict
modules.description: Understanding and resolving conflicts.

modules.title: Negotiation
modules.description: Negotiation skills and strategies.

modules.title: Effective Decision Making
modules.description: Making informed and responsible decisions.

modules.title: Critical Thinking
modules.description: Evaluating information and making reasoned judgments.

modules.title: Creative Thinking
modules.description: Generating new ideas and solutions.

modules.title: Problem Solving
modules.description: Identifying and resolving problems effectively.

modules.title: Leisure
modules.description: Using free time constructively and enjoyably.

modules.title: Time Management
modules.description: Organizing and prioritizing tasks.

modules.title: Child Labour
modules.description: Understanding and addressing child labor issues.

modules.title: Human Rights
modules.description: Understanding and protecting human rights.

modules.title: Gender Education
modules.description: Understanding gender roles and promoting equality.

modules.title: CAT Content
modules.description: Assessment content for the course.
